text: Peterborough TMD is a traction maintenance depot located in Peterborough, Cambridgeshire, England. The depot is situated on the East Coast Main Line, to the north of Peterborough station. The depot code is PB. ==History== The depot was opened by British Rail in March 1969. == Present == From 2015, the depot has no allocation. It is, instead, a stabling point for DRS Class 37 locomotives. == References == ===Sources=== * * Category: Railway depots in England Category:Rail transport in Cambridgeshire
title: Peterborough TMD
